titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) مَعْدِنُ الْعِلْمِ وَ شَجَرَةُ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ مُخْتَلَفُ الْمَلَائِكَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 31 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup> are a Mine of Knowledge, and a tree of the Prophet-hood, and interchage of the Angels (where Angels come and go)

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) وَرَثَةُ الْعِلْمِ يَرِثُ بَعْضُهُمْ بَعْضاً الْعِلْمَ
titles.en: Chapter 32 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup> are the inheritors of the Knowledge, inheriting the Knowledge from each other

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الطَّرِيقَةَ الَّتِي حُثَّ عَلَى الِاسْتِقَامَةِ عَلَيْهَا وَلَايَةُ عَلِيٍّ ( عليه السلام ) .
titles.en: Chapter 30 – The doctrine which it is urged to be steadfast upon is Wilayah of Ali<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) مَعْدِنُ الْعِلْمِ وَ شَجَرَةُ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ مُخْتَلَفُ الْمَلَائِكَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 31 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup> are a Mine of Knowledge, and a tree of the Prophet-hood, and interchage of the Angels (where Angels come and go)

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (8/ 3)

narrator_chain.text: أَحْمَدُ بْنُ مِهْرَانَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ غَيْرِ وَاحِدٍ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ رِبْعِيِّ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ أَبِي الْجَارُودِ قَالَ

text: قَالَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) مَا يَنْقِمُ النَّاسُ مِنَّا فَنَحْنُ وَ اللَّهِ شَجَرَةُ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ بَيْتُ الرَّحْمَةِ وَ مَعْدِنُ الْعِلْمِ وَ مُخْتَلَفُ الْمَلَائِكَةِ .

en.hubeali: Ahmad Bin Mihran, from Muhammad Bin Ali, from someone else, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Rabie Bin Abdullah, from Abu Al Jaroud who said,

‘Ali<sup>asws</sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘What makes the people resentful from us<sup>asws</sup>. We<sup>asws</sup>, by Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, are the tree of Prophet-hood, and the House of Mercy, and the Mine of Knowledge, and the inter-change of Angels Where Angels come and go)’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ahmad ibn Mahran has narrated from Muhammad ibn Ali from several people from Hammad ibn ’Isa from Rib‘i ibn ‘Abdallah (a.s.) from ibn Jarud who has said that Ali ibn al-Husayn (a.s.) has said the following. “What is it obscures us to people? (People do not maintain hostility towards us.) We, I swear by Allah, are the tree of the prophet-hood, the house of blessings, the mine of knowledge and the center wherein angels interchange.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (9/ 3)

parts.text: عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ الْمُغِيرَةِ عَنْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ بْنِ أَبِي زِيَادٍ عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ أَمِيرُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ ( عليه السلام ) إِنَّا أَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ شَجَرَةُ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ مَوْضِعُ الرِّسَالَةِ وَ مُخْتَلَفُ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَ بَيْتُ الرَّحْمَةِ وَ مَعْدِنُ الْعِلْمِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Abdullah Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from his father, from Abdullah Al Mugheira, from Ismail Bin Abu Ziyad,

(It has been narrated) from Ja’farasws Bin Muhammadasws, from hisasws fatherasws having said: ‘Amir Al-Momineenasws said: ‘Weasws, the Peopleasws of the Household, are the tree of Prophet-hood, and a receptacle of the Message, and the inter-change of Angels (where Angels come and go), and the House of Mercy, and the Mine of Knowledge’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from ‘Adallah ibn Muhammad ibn ’Isa from his father from ‘Adallah ibn al-Mughirah from Isma‘il ibn abu Ziyad from Ja‘far ibn Muhammad (a.s.) from his father (a.s.) from Amir al-Mu’minin Ali (a.s.) who has said the following. “We, the Ahl al-Bayt (family of the Holy Prophet), are the tree of the prophet-hood, the station of the Messenger-ship of (Allah), the center wherein the angels interchange, the house of blessings and the mine of knowledge.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرسل مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/9)

narrator_chain.text: أَحْمَدُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْخَشَّابِ قَالَ

text: حَدَّثَنَا بَعْضُ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ خَيْثَمَةَ قَالَ قَالَ لِي أَبُو عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَا خَيْثَمَةُ نَحْنُ شَجَرَةُ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ بَيْتُ الرَّحْمَةِ وَ مَفَاتِيحُ الْحِكْمَةِ وَ مَعْدِنُ الْعِلْمِ وَ مَوْضِعُ الرِّسَالَةِ وَ مُخْتَلَفُ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَ مَوْضِعُ سِرِّ اللَّهِ وَ نَحْنُ وَدِيعَةُ اللَّهِ فِي عِبَادِهِ وَ نَحْنُ حَرَمُ اللَّهِ الْأَكْبَرُ وَ نَحْنُ ذِمَّةُ اللَّهِ وَ نَحْنُ عَهْدُ اللَّهِ
فَمَنْ وَفَى بِعَهْدِنَا فَقَدْ وَفَى بِعَهْدِ اللَّهِ وَ مَنْ خَفَرَهَا فَقَدْ خَفَرَ ذِمَّةَ اللَّهِ وَ عَهْدَهُ .

en.hubeali: Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Abdullah Bin Muhammad, from Al Khashhab who said, ‘Some of our companions narrated from Khusayma, who said,

‘Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> said to me: ‘O Khusayma! We<sup>asws</sup> are the tree of Prophet-hood, and the House of Mercy, and keys of the Wisdom, and the Mine of Knowledge, and the receptacle of the Message, and an inter-change of the Angels (where Angels come and go), and a receptacle of the Secrets of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and we<sup>asws</sup> are the depository among His<sup>azwj</sup> servants, and we<sup>asws</sup> are the Great Sanctity of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and we<sup>asws</sup> are the Guarantee of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and we Are the Covenant of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>.

Therefore, the one who is loyal to our<sup>asws</sup> Covenant so is loyal with the Covenant of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and the one who disregards it, so he has disregarded the Guarantee of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and His<sup>azwj</sup> Covenant’.
en.sarwar: 3. Ahmad ibn Muhammad has narrated from Muhammad ibn al-Husayn from ‘Adallah ibn Muhammad from al-Kashshab. He has said that a number of our people have narrated from al-Khaythama who has said that abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) said to him the following. “O Khaythama, we are the tree of prophet-hood, the house of blessings, the keys to wisdom, the mine of knowledge, the station of the Messenger-ship of (Allah), the center wherein the angels interchange and the place for the secrets of Allah. We are the trust of Allah among the people and we are the great Sanctuary of Allah. We are the promised responsibility of Allah and we are His covenant. Whoever remains true to our covenant he has remained true to the covenant of Allah. Whoever disregards his covenant with us he has disregarded his covenant and responsibility towards Allah.”
